name: Too Much Slime (Web)
description:
My entry for the ludum dare compo! 

As stated this game is a  2D Platformer with a twist to fit the Ludum Dare Theme!

You control a slime that is constantly growing in size! Shoot slime to shrink and get a small boost in the opposite direction of the shot!

Thanks for looking and hopefully you get a little fun out of this :)
